QuestData.Title: The Stone Shards
QuestData.Description: Ancient stones are strewn across this land. The elements flock to them, surrounding them protectively.$B$BThese are sites of great power, and the largest is just west of Hammerfall. Not a soul trespasses, but if you go there alone, you can hear whispers from the earth itself.$B$BI have not visited there in a long while... but our grunts have told me the whispers have started again. Would you look for me? Will you see if the stones still speak?
QuestData.RewardText: <The shards pulse softly, and a whisper slowly echoes through your head.>$B$BHelp...
